description: Time snapshot was taken, in Epoch milliseconds. Same across all rows and all tables in the snapshot, and uniquely defines a particular snapshot.
name: snapshot_timestamp
start_time
description: App start time, it can be the time when app is created or resumed

name: stop_time
description: App stop time, it can be the time when app is deleted or paused

name: environment_variables
description: All environment variables AoU passes to Leo when creating App.
